mapper.insert: insert into t_blood_pressure_setting (id, high, low, periodic, user_id) values (#{id}, #{high}, #{low}, #{periodic}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select id, high, low, periodic, user_id from t_blood_pressure_setting where id = #{id}
select id, high, low, periodic, user_id from t_blood_pressure_setting

select t.*,r.time,p.patient_id from t_blood_pressure_setting t left join t_user_ext p on t.user_id = p.user_id left join t_report r on r.user_id = t.user_id and r.time = (select max(time) from t_report where user_id = t.user_id);
